name: Eric McElroy
text: One of my favorite pizza joints, if not my favorite. Their dough is unbeatable in my book. I just wish their beer prices were a little cheaper. Just a little.

name: Irene Flores
text: This is my spouse's and my very favorite place for pizza and we travel 1-1/2 hrs. to get here. Full of ingredients. Served hot and fresh with a smile. We never had a bad pizza here. And we always have better than great service. We were able ‚Ä¶More

name: Janie Brooks
text: TRULY THE BEST PIZZA EVER!!! We've tried a lot of different pizza joints in the past few months for work, and  mellow mushroom absolutely rises to the top as the best pizza ever. The other options are a distant second at best. Mellow ‚Ä¶More

name: Josh Keiser
text: Fantastic pizza! Our first time but not the last. Hand tossed style crust. The wings were tasty as well. Great service and reasonable prices.  Wheelchair friendly.  Free parking. Lots of televisions. Great section of tap brews, I counted over 35! Great pizza joint.

name: Ashley Chevalier
text: Go for the atmosphere. Stay for the food! This place is excellent. Very cool spot.

name: A Sullivan
text: Stay clear of the gluten-free pizza!  This was a terrible pizza.  The crust was so thin and totally burnt.  The pizza had no cheese.  Mellow Mushroom, why do you think you can charge more for this pizza?  We paid $2 extra for gluten free ‚Ä¶More

name: Sarah Walters
text: Awesome place. We had pizza that was superb and enjoyed a few beers. Service was great. Unique decor that we really enjoyed. This is worth a visit. Inexpensive and delicious. Well done.

name: Kacie Pearson
text: I absolutely love this place! Came Saturday with a large group they were very accommodating! Always have a great experience even with it being a full house Saturday night. Seen management helping out in the bar they were so busy. Great Staff & Great Management!!

name: Jillian Honm
text: I love this place. It has good gluten-free pizza for my daughter, and I love the smell and atmosphere. Their food is so good, too. Also, the last time I went, they changed the TV to a different game for us that was hard to find. That was ‚Ä¶More

name: Jamal Harris
text: We came to eat at Mellow Mushroom on a pretty  busy Saturday night. The service was great & the pizza was even better. We got the meaty pizza, wow! Usually, I don't eat the crust because it's wasted/empty calories, but the dough was too ‚Ä¶More

name: William Walker
text: This place is amazing! I have Celiac disease and am allergic to dairy, so I have to order a gluten free crust and vegan cheese. And they cook it completely separate from other pizzas to cut out cross contamination! The prices are reasonable, the staff are lovely, and the pizza is delicious. I love it!

name: Jill Adams
text: Insane good pizza. The people that work at this place are the nicest hard working people ever. The food takes a while but is well worth the wait because this may have been the best pizza I've had in Murfreesboro. Loved the vibe and the location. Will definitely be back!

name: Jerry Fuhrer
text: Very good pizza, wings, and cheesy garlic bread.   The server took excellent service of our 9 person(2 toddlers) while tending bar.  The manager was also keeping our kids entertained.  It was an amazing experience!!

name: Katy Jones
text: Never have I ever been more disappointed with an establishment. This specific store has slandered the name Mellow Mushroom. It was fine a few years back but then they tried to change everything. They tried to make it a ‚Äúsports bar‚Äù. Who ‚Ä¶More

name: Haley Imhoff
text: I love the vibe of Mellow Mushroom, its so cool and chill! The staff was super friendly, I talked to the manager while my food was finishing cooking and he seemed like a genuine dude! I would have given five stars but they put butter and Parmesan on my pizza crust after I asked them not too so I couldn‚Äôt eat a good part of my pizza :(

name: Angie Strube
text: I was looking forward to visiting Mellow Mushroom since I haven't been in a while.  I wish I would have looked at the reviews before I went.  It took 20 minutes to get our drinks. Which we couldn't even get what we ordered because the Coke ‚Ä¶More

name: Haley I
text: My server was super nice, but the wait was a little too much. I waited 10 minutes for my beer and another 30 for my pizza. My food was delicious but they got my friends calzone wrong. We weren‚Äôt gonna send it back since it took so long and we didn‚Äôt wanna wait that long again.

name: Kimberly Sims
text: We had out of town company and were trying to find a place for 13 people, including several young children, to eat on a Saturday evening. Someone asked if there was a Mellow Mushroom in Murfreesboro. I called and asked how long of a wait it ‚Ä¶More

name: josh vance
text: The food was amazing and service was very welcoming and loved the staff. Very cool and down to earth people. Seemed as if there weren‚Äôt enough servers scheduled though. I heard they only get paid 2 something an hour. Seems a little unfair ‚Ä¶More

name: Triquetra
text: I always love getting their pizza and enjoy the large selection of draft beer on tap. There was plenty of parking with ample handicap spaces. The tables and floors appeared to be clean and maintained. The men's restroom was clean. Very friendly service with a smile.

name: Melanie Johnson
text: A party of 2 arrived and were seated promptly as it was near empty. A party of 3 were seated shortly afterwards adjacent to us. The young lady who seated both parties immediately waited on the other party even though we were first. She ‚Ä¶More

name: Ben Wich
text: Environment felt clean and the food was very tasty. Some people at my table had a worse experience (pizza toppings not available and we weren't told until the pizza came out, silverware not being ready and it wasn't very busy), but it was probably an off night. Overall it was good and I'd recommend going

name: Brittanie Goodin
text: Was very highly impressed. We had the magic mushroom soup. Very tasty. For a group of people from New York, this is the best pizza we have had down here so far. Very dog friendly. They were very patient. And very happy with the customer service. Will definitely be coming back here again.

name: Thomas Wilson
text: They have a great whole grain crust, which is hard to find. The sauce is a little too "mellow" for my taste, and the prices are comparatively high.

name: Allison Lumpkin
text: They know why they got 1 star. New owner firing me after being with the company over 13 years, on my day off, the day after I signed my management agreement was pretty low. Now hearing they fired my replacement while she was on vacation... I can not recommend this place. Your staff is your lifeline.

name: Sherry Wilson
text: First time. Only ordered a Chef Salad but it was really good. The service was prompt and pleasant.  I will return soon to try the pizza.

name: Lacey Turner
text: I‚Äôm loving all the new updates happening to this location! The new owner is doing a fantastic job putting his all into this store. I‚Äôm really impressed by the new General Manager and the other two restaurant managers. Change is HARD and ‚Ä¶More

name: Lindsay R.
text: Not happy about the news I heard today. I‚Äôve been a regular for a long time and I honestly only come bc of the amazing staff. Hearing that the GM Allison was fired has me very upset. Does this mean the new owner will fire the rest of the ‚Ä¶More

name: Sharana Jones
text: Great food! Love that they use paper straws & environmentally friendly to go boxes.

name: Sarah M.
text: Went for lunch with friends on the weekend and had a blast. There is literally a bus in the restaurant that has a driver seat with steering wheel and a table that can fit a large group. Our kids had a blast eating on the bus!! They have ‚Ä¶More

name: Corie Chaney
text: Been looking since October for a good pizza place and finally got a chance to try Mellow Mushroom. ‚ù§ The calzones were amazing, my search is over!

name: Ray Barnes
text: They were out of some meats and cheeses. They went out of their way to make it up to me. The crew was awesome and the supervisor on duty, Kiley, made my stop worthwhile.

name: Katie Papas
text: I love this place. They have such a variety of food even though it's a pizza joint. If you can't find something you want they have "build your own" options for just about everything and vegetarian options. Great staff and customer service, even when busy.

name: Kylie Stewart
text: The food is always great and the atmosphere is laid back.  Our waitress was phenomenal and took great care of us.  I would definitely recommend Mellow Mushroom

name: Nathan Mills
text: Went there on a recommendation, and it did not disappoint! Our waitress was very friendly and helpful and steered us toward some great options. Although, to be honest, I don't know that there would be bad options there. ‚Ä¶More

name: Candy Rhodes
text: Just visited this restaurant while I was in town visiting a friend and the experience was amazing. We recieved the biggest pizza I've ever seen in my life, and the server was so friendly! The new GM even came out and introduced herself and she was very personable. Everyone should check out this up and coming gem!

name: Alyssa Lang
text: I cannot review the food but the drinks were great, the atmosphere was fun and the staff incredibly friendly.  The music was top notch.  I would recommend a stop at this fine watering hole, especially for the cute bartender ;)

name: Melissa Mirone
text: The pizza is amazing and the salads are so big and tasty. Definitely worth the price.

name: Shells
text: We were seated quickly and seen to by our waiter just as fast. It was our party of two along with 2 or 3 other small parties. We got our pizza order in and waited 45 minutes. Once we received the pizza it had been cooked to our order, but ‚Ä¶More

name: Micah Hughes
text: Owner doesn‚Äôt care about his staff. To him, everyone is replaceable and longtime employees who have stuck with the restaurant for years are treated like they‚Äôre expendable. He doesn‚Äôt care enough about the restaurant to learn the menu of ‚Ä¶More

name: Sydney Harriford
text: There's a lot of seating in this place and servers are so nice. It's amazing to see the back of house staff work the dough. When I was there, there were three people making pizza and it was awesome seeing them throwing the dough in the air. Everything that we had was delicious.

name: William Delgadillo
text: I requested that we sit near the bus, and they let us sit inside. She was so excited! She enjoyed looking at all of the little paintings and pictures. When we ordered the pizza, the waitress suggested that I order it cut into smaller pieces for my daughter, which was very thoughtful of her. The pizza was delicious

name: Margo Thompson
text: They removed some of the best pizzas, when I asked the manager she said they can still make the pizzas but without certain sauces. Apparently what the manager says doesn't matter, kitchen can't do it. They used to be great but now they're ‚Ä¶More

name: JoshFryMMA92
text: I got the calzone with vegan cheese and it was so good. The best I've had in a while

name: Stephen Himes
text: Really cool vibe. I like the patio changes that are in the process of being done and the lights on the outside. I live nearby and always drove past this place. Looking forward to having a chill place to hangout on a patio this fall with my dog, Knox

name: Jeff Robinson
text: I love this pizza place. I wish it had a better location (for me). Its family friendly. They have nice artwork. Good music was playing, with TVs with sports on. Pizza is expensive, but I think its worth it. A large specialty is gonna be in the $25 range.

name: Andi Phillips
text: First pizza was "eaten by the oven", second pizza was covered in bacon and tater tots, not what I ordered. I sent the second pizza back. The manager told me that she would comp my pizza.... I didn't get a pizza. The rest of my group had finished eating, so I didn't get to eat. Not going back.

name: Joe Campbell
text: Food is excellent, service is terrific. Wait staff very knowledgeable.

name: Joel Hausler
text: Quirky place. Good food and great beer selection.

name: April Wall
text: Great food, great atmosphere, great service!!! They've got paper straws. Great place for big crowds or small crowds

name: Chasity Denman
text: Love the place and ppl,food Is always fresh and amazing

name: Nate Landsperger
text: Really impressed by the delicious pizza.  Also has a large variety of beer on tap and great service.  Kids love the bus! Will be back for sure.

name: David Ellis
text: Chill atmosphere, laid back staff, but intentive and kind, vegan options make for a friday night meet up among the vegan community ideal. One of the best chain coast to coast.

name: Jason Gamble
text: Over the top, mind blowing GOOD pizza! Their crust is perfect: crisp on the outside, moist and tender interior, chewy and not soggy, with amazing flavor. Their specialty pieces are superb. But you can get a traditional pizza as well with ‚Ä¶More

name: Ben Rankin
text: Mellow Mushroom has always served delicious pizza in a great dining room that is always interesting, but this particular trip was made great by our server Stephen Brown.  When we came in my son was in a bad mood, but Stephen was super ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Robertson
text: Very friendly staff good drinks but frozen pizza is better. We ordered the house special.

name: Celeste Francisco
text: My finance loved it, me... Not so much.

name: Janet Anderson
text: Food was great. Service was great. The problem was when a young man sat at the bar playing video games and then goes behind the bar to put his shoulder length hair up in a bun. He then proceeds to start his shift.  He mixed a drink a grabs ‚Ä¶More

name: Ricky Scott
text: The kids love coming here, so anywhere I can take them to keep them occupied for a while is a huge plus. I could see my wife and I coming back here for some drinks at night on the patio or at the bar. The kitchen seems kinda slow, but their ‚Ä¶More

name: Alexandra Bellucci
text: Creative dishes and friendly staff. The outside patio was wonderful and comfortable! This is a great escape from the MTSU dive area.

name: robert hicks
text: Pretty decent pizza. I'm not a big pizza eater BUT this is better then a Domino's,  Papa John's, Pizza Hut and definitely better then Jet Pizza. So if your a pizza person you'd probably give this place a 5 star rating.  The service was on par.

name: Ashley Kuplic
text: I love this place, best vegan pizza ever!

name: Erin R
text: Excellent customer service from the hostes, waiter, and Managers. But the pizza was very comparable to a Diginro pizza.

name: charity beilfuss
text: One of my all time favorite pizza spots. The pizza is gourmet with unique flavors that will put a smile on your face. They have a huge selection of beer. The atmosphere is cozy and trendy, you could dress up or down and still feel comfortable there. I highly recommend visiting!

name: Abi Welch
text: Hour and a half of waiting. Messed up order. Not first bad experience here.

name: Thomas McCartan
text: Food was awesome.pretzel bites with the PBR cheese dip were lovely. The table service was a little slow but the food was definitely worth the wait. Thanks Wes üëç.

name: Tom R.
text: My wife and I are regulars at Murfreesboro mellow mushroom. We actually met the new owner, Todd while we visited recently. Thinking he was a really good guy and then hearing today that he fired the GM of 14 years, Allison... because he was ‚Ä¶More

name: M Mold
text: I stood in the lobby for 5 minutes while at least 3 employees looked at me without saying anything and never sat my family. Really if you can't even greet someone as they come in the door maybe you shouldn't be working in a restaurant. I won't ever be back.

name: Bethany Marie
text: Stopped in on our way back from Atlanta to Chicago.  Fun vibe and great pizza!  Something different about the crust, but in a good way.

name: jennifer Beer-Elrod
text: Great food and service and game nights are fun!

name: Jules Myers
text: I waited for a small vegan pizza to go for an hour.Not sure what was going on but had 1 guy tell me when ordering 25 min.After waiting 45 min he came back and said 5 more min..I saw a guy making pizza ask other employees what I was waiting ‚Ä¶More

name: Kyshira Simmons
text: The wait was terribly long. I asked for ranch with my wings, I got all the way home and realized they did not provide it. The wings were bland. The pizza was ok, when I got home my pizza had an huge dent in the middle which wasn‚Äôt ‚Ä¶More

name: Jenna Young
text: Great place to catch the Georgia game. Bartender is very knowledgable and professional.

name: Robert Nugent
text: Food was great! Service was a little slow.

name: angie wilson
text: Really neat kinda place

name: barbara baggett
text: Clean... fast... flavorful...will go back

name: Alli C
text: Love their pizzas, we always get the Mighty Meaty. However, service is not great. Servers kind of go missing after you‚Äôre seated and especially after getting your food. Last time we went, our server literally disappeared after she dropped ‚Ä¶More

name: James Pearson
text: Decent drinks and damn good salads. Pizza is pretty good, too. Check out the happy hour and chill in the bus. Ask about their local brews and twist on classic cocktails.

name: RoboPuck the War Robot
text: The pizza is amazing and they have a great selection of craft beer on tap!

name: Nikki Saull
text: Good pizza cute atmosphere a tad pricey for what you get.

name: John Reasoner
text: I love this restaurant. Staff is always friendly. Sometimes they make mistakes, but humans work there. I have been there countless times, but never thought to leave a review.

name: James Humphreys
text: Great service and great food. Highly recommend the wings for appetizers...

name: Vertari
text: Sure would be nice to get paid on time.

name: Ava Petkovic
text: Love the $10 bottomless mimosas and Ricki is super sweet!

name: Diana Sullivan
text: Nice, casual place. Staff is very friendly and efficient.  Pizza is DIVINE and the salads were so fresh!

name: Roger Woods II
text: Well what do I say...the pizza is ridiculously good, nough said

name: Alaina Box
text: We enjoyed the vegan vegetable calzone. It was so good, but so huge! The hummus appetizer was wonderful! We will definitely be back!

name: Shonda Young
text: Delicious food, good atmosphere

name: Rob Petersen
text: This place has good pizza.

name: Charles Pickett
text: Gotta go with the 5 star on this... fun, clean, and enjoyable. Wait staff is awesome and the food is awesomesauce. They built a bus in the store and it's great, perfect for private parties. Just make sure you reserve it cause everybody wants to sit there when they go. Great pizza and great wings

name: Eric Mills
text: I have enjoyed Mellow Mushroom for over 10 years. The first one was in Winston-Salem and it was amazing. Great food, great atmosphere and great price. Since then I've eaten at MM in Nashville, Pensacola and now Murfreesboro. The food never ‚Ä¶More

name: Scott Wilcox
text: Really good food except they were out of potatoes for the potatoes pizza. Service was good. Went as a large group.

name: Troy Mathis
text: Nice staff..great food

name: Andy Brown
text: Good food, friendly people. Pretzel bites are awesome!

name: Ammie Westfall
text:
Worst experience ever
Waited an hour, pizza never arrived

name: ED McCuller
text: Good Pizza and great service.

name: Millette Jones
text: Great food but the service was way too slow for the number of people in the restaurant.

name: Mary Driver
text: The pizza is always good.

name: jeremy hanna
text: Its ok pizza nothing great but the service is great here great place to sit back and hang out and eat some food and have a drink

name: JR‚Äôs Bushcraft Outdoors Southern Style
text: Oh man if you want to sit in the bus!! It's so cool and the food is the best !!

name: cale gilpin
text: When I was a student at MTSU I didn‚Äôt really make it over here, now I‚Äôve found myself here quite a bit. I haven‚Äôt been able to find pizza this good anywhere else in the boro, and the service is an added bonus.  I would really like if they ‚Ä¶More

name: James Harlan
text: My favorite pizza in the boro. Gets bust at times but worth it every time. Will be trying the wings soon

name: jeana Crofts
text: Waitress was great as was the food.  Big big portions and worth the money.

name: geoffrey kimber
text:
Good pizza and salads. Friendly staff and a broad selection of beers on tap.

Pizza crust is a bit thicker than NY style and the sauce is mild.

name: Gary Miller
text: Best  pizza,Great  staff

name: Kenneth Hughes
text: Been there several times before and it has been great, this time not so much. Staff was great, slow getting food, and one was wrong had to remake it, which took forever.

name: Anthony Jones
text:
Always good.
Micah is a fabulous server...always look for her when you eat there.
No matter the choice of meal, you will not be disappointed.

name: Faye Powers
text: Took an hour.to get our drinks,another hour to get our food & then they forgot to turn in one order,so they took that off our bill,but there was.9 of us,but still,Oh my.Gosh I .U really.need.a.adult there ,over seeing everything.We.also ‚Ä¶More

name: Joy Redding
text: This place is super cool with the best pizza and the most laid back environment. The staff is great and they have an excellent selection of beer to go with their equally excellent selection of pizzas and toppings. They don't just do pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Felicia Oliver
text: Love it. Nice people great food !

name: Brian Jenkins
text: If you like pizza for the perfect crispy, doughy, never-floppy crust, you'll like mellow mushroom. The sauces and toppings are endless and high-quality, and there are great options for meat lovers and vegetarians. They were one of the first restaurants in the area to offer gluten free alternatives. Lastly, their beer selection is great!

name: Austin & Sarah
text: Pizza is awesome! Everyone's super chill and friendly. Will be coming back!

name: Anna Owen
text: Terrible service, mediocre food. We ordered 3 kids meals for our 3 children, and they only brought us 2. When they finally figured out that they missed one, they brought the pizza out uncut. The apples weren't washed before service. We had ‚Ä¶More

name: Elizabeth Corcoran
text: the service was amazing the pie was awesome I would recommend this to everyone and ask for colt as your server

name: Chris Nichols
text: Pretty good pizza. Got the all meats and the mushroom. Both tasted good and were cooked great. My only complaint from the whole experience is that once the food got to the table, our server kind of disappeared, rarely checking on us until she dropped the check off.

name: Bob Barker
text: Took over an hour to get our carry-out order and it was still wrong. Pizza was bland with almost no sauce.

name: Gary Palmer
text: Excellent pizza, service and experience.

name: Caitlin Coleman
text: Their pizza is so delicious!

name: Andy Jury
text: We sat at the bar and the bar tender was less than attentive. Food was good all the same.

name: A Mc
text: Table service=GREAT, Pizza=GREAT, Willingness of host to clean up door way after advisement=POOR.

name: Tiffany Curtis
text: Best pizza with a groovy bus

name: Sloane Piazzi
text: There's like 50 beers on tap and they have pretzel bites OMG yummm!!! Boro is moving up!!!

name: Cindy Angel
text: Good service and good pizza.  Love the vegetarian options!

name: Hayley Longwith
text: Best pizza in town and great service

name: Michael Osborne
text: Love Mellow Mushroom. My wife had a cheese calzone and I had a gluten free pizza with dairy free cheese which helps prevent fibromyalgia flareups. Very good service and great food. Highly recommended.

name: Kaiden Kinslow
text: Food and atmosphere was good, service was slow but attentive.

name: Nan Stanford
text: My favorite sandwich in Murfreesboro! Avocado on pita bread with lettuce, tomato, onion, mayo,and provolone cheese open face. Called Avocado hoagie but ask for pita bread.

name: Christy Clardy
text: We have eaten there in the past and enjoyed it,  but after our most recent experience we will not return.  We called ahead with a party over 25. The service was horrible. I had to approach the counter to request our drinks after waiting ‚Ä¶More

name: MTSU Boy
text: My food came out wrong, fixed wrong, server was rude and on-site manager (at the time) could have CARED less. I have been to MANY Mellow Mushrooms and never had an issue...but this is not one that I will return to anytime soon.

name: Andy Million
text: I love Mellow Mushroom. I've been coming here for over 6 years. It's a little pricey, so we don't do it more than once a month. Pizza takes it time to cook, but it's not too bad. Great beer selection and the pizza is just great. That dough...

name: Xyan L. Clary
text: Not the best pizza I've ever had. Still pretty good though. And the scenery is terrific!

name: Andrea Craighead
text: Awesome pizza, but do not order a Large unless you have more than 2 people. It's HUGE!!

name: Arturo Elizondo
text: great service, food & beer selection

name: Spooner
text: Good food. Not unreasonably pricy and great staff!

name: Jo Maxwell
text: Stay trippy little hippie

name: Danette Robinson
text: The pizza wasn't good & I was not impressed. I thought maybe it would be different here than it's other location and I was wrong

name: Robert Raiman
text: Ritz burger is just excellent. Wife had the tofu wrap and really liked it. Beef to vegan to gluten free. All very good.

name: Terry Morelock
text: Super cool place, awesome craft beer selection! Try the "Holy Shitake mushroom" pizza drizzled with truffle oil.... verry good.

name: Danisha Harris
text: Really cool place, friendly staff. Always smiling faces.

name: Margaret Jacobs
text: The service was awesome and the food was awesome I will be back

name: Melissa White
text: Great pie!!!  Service was awesome. In town  from Michigan we loved it.

name: Durk Milliron
text: Pizza was excellent way staff was great, Megan our wait staff was very attentive. Will be coming back.

name: Dean Chauvin
text: Terrible service. Kitchen lost our ticket. We waited as other patrons came and left. Eventually we were told about the problem. Thankfully the manager made good on the situation. But it'll be awhile before I go back.

name: timothy cline
text: Pizza is extremely good

name: karla bartness
text: Very hippie and delish. Service was fantastic

name: John Webster
text: Excellent pizza! Great service.. lots of beer on tap.

name: Sonia Gers
text: I highly recommend the Holy Shiitake Pie for any Vegetarians out there. We substitute the cheeses that it comes with for vegan cheese to reduce the dairy. But the pizza is awesome! ‚Ä¶More

name: Harmony Rivers
text: Loooove their pizza. Such a unique place to eat

name: kevin lammons
text: Had a great time celebrating my son's 9th birthday!! Colt and the staff did a GREAT job accommodating out 30+ group. The food was amazing and the kids had a blast eating inside the bus. Thank You Mellow Mushroom Murfreesboro!!

name: Bridget Lowe
text: We were very disappointed in our visit. We had a waitress that said she was new , but it took her a long time to get our drink order and drinks. We waited another 20-30 minutes and she asked how we were doing, we had to bring it to her ‚Ä¶More

name: Tony Lu
text: Amazing

name: Mark Stepp
text: Great pizza and beer selection.

name: Just Me
text: This place is very unique. The host that I was greeted by was very nice. However, the bartender, that is a different story. I was the only person at the bar waiting for service. She greeted me and said she'd be right back. At that moment ‚Ä¶More

name: Eli Daconto
text: Awesome food and great service

name: Nicole jenkins
text: Really good food! I'm allergic to dairy so it's nice to have a place to go that has vegan cheese. The prices are a little steep though.

name: Melissa McDaniel
text: Best calzones around. Most places the 3" of ends of the calzones are all bread but there's is not like that. Just the very very ends are mostly bread

name: Catherine Wilson OodlesofSchnoodles
text: Amazing gourmet pizza made with quality ingredients!  Fun atmosphere and amazing service!  Tell Eye (yes, that is his name that Cat said HI!)

name: Sean Fuller
text: I love every Mellow Mushroom I've been to.  This one is my favorite because it is so close to home.  Of course their pizza is great, but they also have a wonderful selection of beer.

name: Big Kev
text: Pizza with alot of choices for toppings. Crust was very good. Nice atmosphere as well.

name: David McPeak
text: Love the pizza and beer selection. Great place.

name: Liz Erlandson
text: I was sorely disappointed in this mellow mushroom. We stopped on our way home. My mushroom and cheese hoagie was cold and the pita bread it was on was falling apart because it was never heated properly. Everything that came out that was ‚Ä¶More

name: Aaron Zlotky
text: Great employees, good food, and a good selection of beers.

name: Ashley Elder
text: This place has NEVER failed me. I'm in love with here!

name: Dont Subscribe
text: The pizza is good, but the price is outrageous. Not only did I pay extremely high amount, but when I got my pizza the crust was a third of my pizza. Was expecting a lot better. Will not be going back unless the prices go down.

name: Alan Cook
text: Terrible service wait over 2 hours for a pizza

name: David LaRoche
text: I love the 'room in Murfreesboro. It is convenient to campus and downtown. The staff is always friendly and well trained. Don't let the tie-dyes fool you, these kids run this pizza joint like they own it.

name: Tiffany Maynard
text: First time here and i was very pleased

name: Tea Lindy
text: Grankids love Pizza on the bus, friendly service

name: That Guy
text: The standard I hold all upper-tier pizza joints to. I've had issues with them overcharging before, but that's been a while. 9/10 for a nice atmosphere and great pie.

name: John Vanus
text: Great food. Best pizza in middle Tennessee in my opinion

name: Virginia Paul
text: Great pizza and service. Fun place to go and the grandkids had a ball on the bus!

name: Erica Morelock
text: Our family loves the Holy Shiitake pizza. You cant go wrong with Mellow Mushroom!

name: Tina Cremeans
text: I wasn't very impressed by the food here. The service I received the people were really nice. The atmosphere was really up beat.

name: Mariano Chirigliano
text: Great atmosphere and beers on tap. Had a little problem with my food coming out not how i ordered it but they were quick to correct it and even gave me a discount on my bill. Friendly staff

name: Teach All Nations
